jobs.description:
Leading refactoring and infracture of the main travel engine of Spring Hoteles app. Optimizing the performance and user experience of the web app.

In charge of several key points of the company's OTA:
- Team leading.
- Scalable fronted infra.
- High testing coverage.
- Setuped CI/CD saving hours of deploying.
- Crafted a design system for component reusability between the repos.
- Created web components for the engine integration.

- Frontend tech migration from Nuxt2 to Nuxt3.
- Pixel perfect layout for one of the biggest travel agencies in Spain.
- Implemented better UX increasing the sellings.

- Improved the performance making almost 100 score in mobile Google's lighthouse metrics.
- Made the website accessible for everyone.

I am in charge of some of the BMW webpage's frontend layout, microservices and automations. I have configured the CI/CD for every company's project, with production contenerized environment and remote deployments.

- Built the platform with accessible form to create product quotations.
- Crafted a fast notification service.
- Created reusable django web components for better reusability and scalability of the project.
- Managed to created the required MVP of project in no time.
Refactored several web components and styles from an already started project about a NFT SPA in react. I made the microservices integration for the user auth.
Made a fast lib to verify and decrypt signed Ethereum tokens and use it as middleware in Golang backends and libs.

I made a complex infrastructure that connects several microservices in different programming languages to create an automated SAAS that generates videos / images from templates and scraped data such as online blog posts with a clean and simple user interface to schedule the publication of the contents.
Implemented the layout for a static web3 crypto related landing pages with vuejs, web3js and tailwind, making reusable layout components to improve the development experience.
Was in charge of the microservices for a CMS, its Frontend layout, the authentication and the Backend integration with Angular and Java Spring boot.
Created the authentication state, the session persistance, role system and several video features of an crypto investment courses webpage with Vuejs, firebase and docker.
